fluid.description: Object used to define parameters related to the circulation fluid.

grout.description: Object used to define parameters related to grout material.

soil.description: Object used to define parameters related to soil material.

pipe.description: Object used to define parameters related the pipes.

borehole.description: Object used to define static parameters related the borehole.

simulaton.description: Object used to define parameters related to simulation.

geometric_constraints.description: Object used to define geometric constraint parameters for the selected design algorithm.

design.description: Object used to defind parameters related to design and sizing.

ground_loads.description: Annual, hourly ground heat exchanger loads used for sizing. Positive values indicate heat extraction, negative values indicate heat rejection.
